snippet.title: Escape Goat 2 Coming to PS4
snippet.description: The theme of Escape Goat 2 is *transformation.* As you manipulate hidden machinery, walls move around and blocks settle into new places. Things look different when you're done with the room (especially if you employ your mighty horns to their best use).
